ExtendedSection.Title: Setting permissions in the element view content

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
By setting permissions on the element view content, you can determine who is allowed to see the view. Only users with permissions on the elementview content get the view displayed for selection in the page editor.

  • Here you can find out how to set permissions on a resource.
  • Here you get general information on the permission system in OpenCms.
